original_text: So they went and left the crowd behind. Jesus was already in the boat. So the disciples took him across the lake. Some other boats also went with them.
korean_text: 그들이 무리를 떠나 예수를 배에 계신 그대로 모시고 가매 다른 배들도 함께 하더니

sentences.original_text: So they went and left the crowd behind
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 가서 무리를 뒤에 남겼습니다

sentences.original_text: Jesus was already in the boat
So the disciples took him across the lake
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 제자들이 그분을 호수 건너로 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: Some other boats also went with them
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 몇 척의 배도 그들과 함께 갔습니다
